request.description: Get retrieves a customer by ID.  The operation will successfully complete with a "200 OK".  This indicates a successful response.
Put updates an existing customer by ID.  The operation will successfully complete with a "204 No Content".  This indicates a successful response.
Post creates a new customer.  The operation will successfully complete with a "201 Created".  This indicates a successful response.
Post creates a new customer.  The operation will fail and respond with a "400 Bad Request".  This indicates a failed response.  The body response will indicate the column length error.
Delete deletes one customer by ID.  Nothing is sent in the body.  The operation will successfully complete with a "200 OK".  This indicates a successful response.
